system.description: At 20th level, you no longer question the motives of those around you as your refined instincts easily sniff out dishonesty. When listening to a creature speak, provided you share at least one language, you are immediately aware if it is being dishonest though you have no special ability to obtain the truth without using your Channel Divinity. Creatures protected from divination, such as by the nondetection spell, are immune to this feature.
